社会諸科学: (しゃかいしょかがく) - social sciences
社会貢献: (しゃかいこうけん) - contribution to society
社会資本: (しゃかいしほん) - social capital; SOC
社会起業家: (しゃかいきぎょか) - social entrepreneur
社会通念: (しゃかいつうねん) - idea commonly (generally) accepted in the world
社会進出: (しゃかいしんしゅつ) - social progress; getting ahead in society; moving up in the world
社会進化論: (しゃかいしんかろん) - social Darwinism
社会運動: (しゃかいうんどう) - social movement
社会適応: (しゃかいてきおう) - social adjustment
社会部: (しゃかいぶ) - local news section; the city desk
社会部記者: (しゃかいぶきしゃ) - local-news reporter; police reporter; city news reporter
社会階層: (しゃかいかいそう) - social class; social strata; social scale
社会集団: (しゃかいしゅうだん) - social group
社会面: (しゃかいめん) - society or local news page
社債: (しゃさい) - corporate bond; corporate debenture
社債償還: (しゃさいしょうかん) - bond redemption; debenture redemption
社僧: (しゃそう) - priest attached to a shrine
社公連合: (しゃこうれんごう) - coalition of the Socialist Party and the Komeito
社共: (しゃきょう) - (from 社会党 and 共産党) Socialist and Communist Parties
社内: (しゃない) - within a company; in-house
社内ニート: (しゃないニート) - person who is employed but has nothing to do at their company
社内メール: (しゃないメール) - inter-office mail; intra-company mail
社内不倫: (しゃないふりん) - (yoji) adulterous love affair with someone at work
社内体制: (しゃないたいせい) - corporate structure; company structure
社内便: (しゃないびん) - {bus} interoffice mail; in-house mail
社内外: (しゃないがい) - inside and outside the company
社内弁護士: (しゃないべんごし) - in-house lawyer
社内恋愛: (しゃないれんあい) - office romance; office love affair
社内情報: (しゃないじょうほう) - company-internal information
社内結婚: (しゃないけっこん) - marriage between coworkers
社内ＮＥＥＴ: (しゃないニート) - person who is employed but has nothing to do at their company
社務: (しゃむ) - business affairs of a company; clerical business of a Shinto shrine
社務所: (しゃむしょ) - shrine office; office of a Shinto shrine
社協: (しゃきょう) - (from 社会福祉協議会) Council of Social Welfare
社印: (しゃいん) - official seal of a company
社員: (しゃいん) - company employee; company stockholders (esp. in legal contexts)/members of a corporation
社員同士: (しゃいんどうし) - one's fellow workers; fellow employees
社員教育: (しゃいんきょういく) - employee training; employee education
社員旅行: (しゃいんりょこう) - company outing; company retreat
社員証: (しゃいんしょう) - staff identity card; employee ID card
社員食堂: (しゃいんしょくどう) - staff canteen
社団法人: (しゃだんほうじん) - {law}  corporate juridical person; incorporated body; corporation
社団法人情報サービス産業協会: (しゃだんほうじんじょうほうサービスさんぎょうきょうかい) - JISA; Japan Information Service Industry Association
社地: (しゃち) - land owned by a Shinto shrine; land owned by a company
社外発信: (しゃがいはっしん) - external (to a company) communications
社大党: (しゃだいとう) - Socialist Masses Party
社家: (しゃけ) - family of Shinto priests serving a shrine on a hereditary basis
社日: (しゃじつ) - "tsuchinoe" day that falls closest to the vernal or autumnal equinox (a day of religious significance for harvests)
社格: (しゃかく) - shrine ranking (abolished in 1946); company ranking
社歴: (しゃれき) - history of a company
社殿: (しゃでん) - (main building of a) Shinto shrine
社民党: (しゃみんとう) - Social Democratic Party
社稷: (すめらおおもとお) - (しゃしょく only) state/country/nation; tutelary deity/god of grain
社紋: (しゃもん) - shrine crest; crest representing a Shinto shrine
社線: (しゃせん) - private railway or bus line
社訓: (しゃくん) - guiding precepts of a company; company credo; corporate philosophy
社論: (しゃろん) - official editorial viewpoint of a newspaper
社費: (しゃひ) - company expenses; at company expense
社長命令: (しゃちょうめいれい) - order from the company president
社領: (しゃりょう) - land owned by a Shinto shrine
社頭: (しゃとう) - front of (the main building of) a shrine
社風: (しゃふう) - corporate culture; company climate or spirit; the way a company does things
祀る: (まつる) - to deify/to enshrine; to pray/to worship
